Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a healthy plant in a place with water and light.
The student can illustrate a plant in a place without water, showing the effects on the plant.
The student can illustrate a plant in a place without light, showing the effects on the plant.
The student can use observations to show that plants need water to live and grow.
The student can use observations to show that plants need light to live and grow.
